{"id":1811764859,"question_id":4083,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1761446947,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1811764859/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Stable Subarrays With Equal Boundary and Interior Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long countStableSubarrays(vector<int>& capacity) {\n        int N = (int)capacity.size();\n        vector<long long> pref(N+1, 0);\n        for (int i=1; i<=N; i++)\n            pref[i] = pref[i-1] + capacity[i-1];    \n\n        long long ans = 0;\n        unordered_map<int, unordered_map<long long, int>> m;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            ans += m[capacity[i]][pref[i+1] - capacity[i]];\n            m[capacity[i]][pref[i+1]]++;\n        }\n\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"stable-subarrays-with-equal-boundary-and-interior-sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1289}
